title: Smartarget Whatsapp - Contact Us
shortDescription: Allow customers to contact you using Whatsapp
longDescription:
Let's make it easier for your customers to contact you!
Probably most of your users are using Whatsapp, so its time to give them the option to contact you by using Whatsapp.

With 'Whatsapp - Contact Us' you can add a small icon on the bottom-right corner with you phone number and short message as "Contact us" or "message us" etc. 
When user click on the icon - new tab will be pop with Whatsapp for web and chat window with you.
author: TopSoft UG

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Limited features. Visible on homepage only.

products.title: Free Plus
products.shortDescription: No limitations. Visible on all pages. Still FREE!

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

callText.default: Have a question? Contact us now!
callText.description: For example: Have a question? Contact us now
callText.title: Call to action message

iconPosition.description: Where the whatsapp icon should be placed?
iconPosition.title: Whatsapp icon position

versions.releaseNotes:
From today your users can contact you easily by using Whatsapp.
* Add Whatsapp icon to your homepage only!
* Set your phone number
* Choose the location of the icon

versions.releaseNotes:
New feature! Hide the message after 3 seconds
The "Call to Action" message will be shown after 5 seconds and will be hided automatically after 3 seconds

proposedApp.title: Whatsapp - Contact Us
proposedApp.shortDescription: Allow customers to contact you using Whatsapp
proposedApp.longDescription:
Let's make it easier for your customers to contact you!
Probably most of your users are using Whatsapp, so its time to give them the option to contact you by using Whatsapp.

With 'Whatsapp - Contact Us' you can add a small icon on the bottom-right corner with you phone number and short message as "Contact us" or "message us" etc. 
When user click on the icon - new tab will be pop with Whatsapp for web and chat window with you.
proposedApp.author: TopSoft UG

products.longDescription: Show the Whatsapp icon on ALL PAGES!

2. Add your website and configure Whatsapp - Contact Us app for your website
3. Go to Integration and copy the User ID to the input text box to this page
